articles.author: Devan Cole, CNN
articles.title: Blinken says US is working with European allies to look at 'prospect' of banning Russian oil imports - CNN
articles.description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken said Sunday that the US has seen reports of Russian abuses in Ukraine that "would constitute a war crime" and that the Biden administration is committed to supporting investigations into the country's actions.

articles.title: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with European leaders to discuss military aid for Ukraine - CBC News

articles.title: Euro falls vs major currencies, dollar jumps; Ukraine conflict intensifies - CNA
articles.description: NEW YORK :     The euro fell against major currencies and the U.S. dollar rallied on Friday as worries increased over the impact of the escalating Ukraine-Russia conflict, especially on Europe's growth outlook.The euro fell below $1.10 against the dollar, hit…
